channel.title: Im very new to this, and got some small problems :)
channel.description:
First of all, its my first time using SCAR so bare over with me :)
I haev downloaded Scar 3.12 and SRL so i got all the includes (or not) cuz when i lounce any thing it says there is missing a file, even when i load the .scar files there folow with SRL. Ex The Ban.scar come with this Failed when compiling Line 40: [Error] (40:11): Unknown identifier 'FindText' in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.12\includes\SRL\SRL\core\Bank.scar And the autotalk.scar come with this Failed when compiling Line 267: [Error] (267:1): Unknown identifier 'TypeSend' in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.12\includes\SRL\SRL\core\AutoTalk.scar
I don't know what to do:P Will some one please help me ? :) you will be my hero if you would help ;)
And what im looking for atm is an auto miner btw :P

item.title: Im very new to this, and got some small problems :)
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

You need to update your SRL via SVN and ensure you have the latest (3.20d ATM) version of SCAR installed.

Read full topic
item.source: Im very new to this, and got some small problems :)

item.title: Im very new to this, and got some small problems :)
item.dc:creator: @Greg_the_Xeno Greg the Xeno
item.description:
@Greg_the_Xeno wrote:

post your script so people can help you.

Read full topic

item.title: Im very new to this, and got some small problems :)
item.dc:creator: @Quazaka Quazaka
item.description:
@Quazaka wrote:

First of all, its my first time using SCAR so bare over with me

I haev downloaded Scar 3.12 and SRL so i got all the includes (or not) cuz when i lounce any thing it says there is missing a file, even when i load the .scar files there folow with SRL.
Ex
The Ban.scar come with this
Failed when compiling
Line 40: [Error] (40:11): Unknown identifier ‘FindText’ in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.12\includes\SRL\SRL\core\Bank.scar
And the autotalk.scar come with this
Failed when compiling
Line 267: [Error] (267:1): Unknown identifier ‘TypeSend’ in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.12\includes\SRL\SRL\core\AutoTalk.scar

I don’t know what to do:P Will some one please help me ? you will be my hero if you would help

And what im looking for atm is an auto miner btw
